name: Ex Umbris.
description:
You are a scientist, involved in an experiment gone sour. Find the keycard and escape the building before it is too late. Interact with objects throughout the building to hide and outsmart the beast.

Find the keycard, head down the stairs, and escape the rampaging beast

. . .

Controls:

WASD/ Arrow Keys -  to move

Space bar - to interact/pick up objects

. . .

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Jam 2020. The theme was "Out of Control"

. . .

Made by:

  • ItsNotSimon - Programming/Level Design
  • Ren3 - Art/Level Design
  • Lamb Sorce - Music/Art

. . .
